input.sentences: this was our groups design chart for the t-shirts that we worked on .
we worked very hard to come up with the unique designs of the t-shirts .
there were some customers who wanted to purchase our t-shirts .
this is a close-up of one the t-shirts with a lot of message on it .
output.sentences: My friend and I set up a stall to sell t-shirts using a diagram we designed beforehand.
On the day of the market, everything went according to plan.
Only a few people visited our stall.
My friend thought that more people would like our unique t-shirt designs.
I think some of the hand-drawn t-shirts might have seemed too strange to attract customers.
